title: Customized MOOC Design for Enhancing Competencies of Ecuadorian Water Utility Operators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding and Operational Experience of Basic Water Supply Systems
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning environment combining offline workshops and online lectures.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure and operational principles of water supply systems.
Learners can apply water quality management and water purification technologies in field settings.
Learners can diagnose operational issues by analyzing data provided on the MOOC platform.
Learners can share problem-solving strategies through collaborative learning with peer operators.

resources: Basic equipment for offline workshops (projector, tablet)
Local water supply system case materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
